China's military lashes out at US after breakthrough talksChina's defence ministry lashed out at the United States on Thursday, a week after their top military officials resumed high-level talks, criticising its continued meddling in the Asia Pacific region and saying it maintained a "Cold War" mindset. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 10:50:14 GMT UJEWN6HLKFODRG32LXNKQXTRJU https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-military-lashes-out-us-after-breakthrough-talks-2023-12-28/Laurie Chen世界
Gold climbs to over three-week high on US rate cut betsGold prices steadied after hitting a more than three-week high on Thursday, deriving support from a weaker U.S. dollar and lower bond yields as markets bet on rate cuts by the Federal Reserve early next year. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 10:22:05 GMT BRFI2CRK4ZP6DNDH345SFZQX4A https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/gold-climbs-over-third-week-high-us-rate-cuts-bets-2023-12-28/Hissay Bhutia市场商品
China aims to build more than half the world's cleaner-fuel ships by 2025China has set itself the goal of producing more than half of the world's ships powered by cleaner fuels by 2025, in guidelines published by the industry ministry on Thursday. Ronaldo's Al-Nassr set for all-Saudi showdown in Asian Champions LeagueCristiano Ronaldo's Al-Nassr will face fellow Saudi Pro League side Al-Fayha in the last 16 of the Asian Champions League with four-times winners Al-Hilal due to take on Iran's Sepahan when the continental club championship returns in February. China says it won't turn a blind eye to Philippines' repeated 'provocations'China on Thursday said it will not turn a blind eye to repeated "provocations and harassment" by the Philippines, amid heightened tensions over a spate of run-ins in the South China Sea. China urges nationals to leave north Myanmar region amid unrestChina's embassy in Myanmar urged its nationals on Thursday to leave the Laukkai area in Kokang region in northern Myanmar as soon as possible, citing growing security risks. China urges regional alert as US military steps up forward deploymentChina's defence ministry on Thursday urged the Asia-Pacific to be on high alert as the United States steps up forward military deployment in the region, after reports of a U.S. plan to revive a Pacific airfield that launched atomic bombings of Japan. South Korea's new national security adviser is veteran diplomatSouth Korea's new national security adviser will be Chang Ho-jin, a seasoned diplomat with extensive experience in U.S. and North Korean affairs, President Yoon Suk Yeol's office said on Thursday. China decries Taiwan for 'hyping up' military threat, sends warplanesChina's defence ministry accused Taiwan's government on Thursday of deliberately "hyping up" a military threat from China for electoral gain ahead of elections on the island in just over two weeks' time, but again sent warplanes into the Taiwan Strait. Three Hong Kong activists jailed up to 6 years for 'terrorism' bomb plotThree Hong Kong activists were jailed for up to six years on Thursday after pleading guilty to charges relating to a plan to place bombs in court buildings and other public infrastructure in 2021 following widespread pro-democracy protests. China's Xiaomi unveils first electric car, plans to become top automakerChinese smartphone maker Xiaomi took the wraps off its first electric vehicle on Thursday and promptly announced it was aiming to become one of the world's top five automakers.
